name: Save On Exit
description: Saves the game to GD Cloud when you exit the game, and loads from cloud when starting the game.

load-on-startup.name: Load on Startup
load-on-startup.description: Should the mod load (sync) your save data from RobTop servers on startup?

show-load-success-popup.name: Show popup on load success
show-load-success-popup.description: Should the mod show a popup when a load (sync) has succeeded?

show-load-failure-popup.name: Show popup on load failure
show-load-failure-popup.description: Should the mod show a popup when a load (sync) has failed?

save-on-shutdown.name: Save on Shutdown
save-on-shutdown.description: Should the mod save (backup) your save data to the RobTop servers when closing the game?

show-save-failure-popup.name: Show popup on save failure
show-save-failure-popup.description: Should the mod show a popup when a save (backup) has failed? If not, it will quit anyways.
